title: Plan It Now
description: Developed a collaborative event planning platform using React.js that enables seamless event organization and real-time collaboration. Implemented features for event creation, team coordination, and schedule management.

title: Payroll Management System
description: A full-stack Payroll Management System using React.js and MySQL that streamlines employee data management and payroll operations. Features include salary calculations, employee records management, and comprehensive reporting capabilities.

title: Portfolio using React
description: This is my personal portfolio website, designed to showcase my skills, experience, and projects in frontend development. Built with React, this platform serves as a professional space where I highlight my expertise in modern web technologies, user-friendly design, and interactive web applications.
